pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extraction of Bands from MODIS Calibrated Radiances MOD02 NRT // Package for processing downloaded MODIS Calibrated radiances Product HDF files. Specifically, MOD02 calibrated radiance product files, and the associated MOD03 geolocation files (for MODIS-TERRA). The package will be most effective if the user installs MRTSwath (MODIS Reprojection Tool for swath products; https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/tools/modis_reprojection_tool_swath, and adds the directory with the MRTSwath executable to the default R PATH by editing ~/.Rprofile.
